title: Why This ESG ETF Could Be Worth It
text:
Why This ESG ETF Could Be Worth It

Investing.com DNA 3rd party newsCommodities Oct 22, 2019 23:11

Why This ESG ETF Could Be Worth It The Xtrackers S&P 500 ESG ETF (SNPE), which debuted in June, is the first ETF to track the S&P 500 ESG Index, the environmental, social and governance (ESG) derivative of the widely followed S&P 500 Index. Cementing the notion that more investors are embracing ESG ETFs, SNPE already has about $98 million in assets under [...] The post Why This ESG ETF Could Be Worth It appeared first on ETF Trends.

Why This ESG ETF Could Be Worth It
